QuestData.Title: Nordrassil's Bough
QuestData.Description: Much has transpired since last we spoke.$b$bI have taken it upon myself to visit the Nexus and recover Anachronos's artifact, but not before using it for myself. Now I too have witnessed that which you have seen.$b$bBefore discussing the matter further, allow me to express my gratitude to you for your assistance, both here and in the Plane of Fire.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Branch of Nordrassil at Amber Ledge in Borean Tundra.
